name: The Normal Man.
description:
It all started as an experiment. We wanted to find out what was truly 'normal'.

The Normal Man. follows normal protagonist Norman Davis as he lives his normal daily life. What he does not  know is that there are cameras recording and watching his every move, and broadcasting his life to the world as if it were a movie.  His parents are actors, his hometown a set, all controlled by sadistic director Hector Wright, who will stop at nothing to produce quality entertainment. After all, everyone loves a good underdog story.

The game is a text-based narrative adventure with psychological horror elements. The Normal Man. contains elements that some may find disturbing, such as death, self-harm, and violence. Please play at your own risk.

This is the second official release by Iceman Zek. Can you believe it???? (You can't. I know. It's mindblowing.)

You can play for free today, or tomorrow, or even yesterday.  Any and all feedback is appreciated.

p.s.

Yes, I have seen the Truman Show.  Also follow me on Instagram. Take a guess as to what my name is on there...

Luv u
